reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: excellent location to explore the historic centre, the apartment was clean, spacious and the view was amazing.

reviews.name: Morgan
reviews.comments: Location was really great! Space was much bigger than expected, full river view, very clean, a gem in a very unassuming street.

reviews.name: Jason
reviews.comments: Awesome location, nice and clean apartment with  great riverviews! great value for money not to forget the awesome hosts, Monica and Patricia!

reviews.name: Steph
reviews.comments: People are very friendly and helpful. Wonderful location, (if walking is ok. for you)  wonderful room, and view.. walking distance to many attractions.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: spacious beautiful and with a glorious view

reviews.name: Sam
reviews.comments: Really friendly and helpful hosts. Very accommodating and a few extra touches added to the stay. Lots of helpful tips and stops advised during our stay, which we would have missed out on! The room we were given exceeded our expectations too!

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: Great view and location. parking is not convenient, but available

reviews.name: ZS
reviews.comments: This place is in the old town and has great views of the Douro river. There are 4 apartments at Topflat.

reviews.name: Emily
reviews.comments: There are no negatives. This is a great flat with great hosts who ensure you are made welcome.

restaurants.name: Restful Rentals
restaurants.address: 205 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: the location, it was spotless, Patricia was great!

reviews.name: Allen
reviews.comments: Property was located near to Douro River where I could see the River view from the room windows, amazing! Room was clean and amenities available in room met my expectations.

reviews.name: David
reviews.comments: Everything was even better than we expected. Clean and bright flat. Great view of the river from the balcony.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: The hosts were excellent, went above and beyond to oblige us with a late check in and organising taxis. Location is excellent, close to all the good spots. Apartment itself is, spacious, modern and spotlessly clean. I'd highly recommend topflat.

reviews.name: Raymond
reviews.comments: Absolutely everything about this flat was amazing. But the hospitality and heartfelt welcome and assistance from the greatest experience.

reviews.name: Laurel
reviews.comments: Lovely and clean, the bed was comfy and the shower was excellent. The location is perfect everywhere is within comfortable walking distance.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: Everything was excellent - the views were amazing, location extremely central, flat was super clean and very quiet. Host met us to provide keys and gave a wonderful overview of  Brooklyn

reviews.name: Michelle
reviews.comments: Wonderful views and really clean and quiet apartment.

reviews.name: Ai-Mei
reviews.comments: Great location for the old city.  Was met at the property and had everything explained to us.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: Great location, amazing view on the top floor with balcony. Sound proof windows.

reviews.name: Gabriel
reviews.comments: Spacious, clean, beautiful, good views- near everything.

reviews.name: Shivi
reviews.comments: When we entered the flat, we couldnâ€™t believe how amazing the view from the patio is.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: We spent a week at Top flat, the apartment was perfect, beautiful, super clean and super equiped for our baby! And the view was just amazing on the Douro, with beautiful sunsets.

reviews.name: Loren
reviews.comments: Close to everything! Light and bright. Everything you could need. Comfy bed, fluffy towels, toiletries, kitchenette with dishes, coffee maker and kettle.

reviews.name: Lori
reviews.comments: Very nice place well located.Hosts are vey welcoming and give good advice Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: Very clean and an amazing view! Every morning was a joy to watch over the river and see the sun coming up.

reviews.name: Brittany
reviews.comments: Having to go up the hill can be tiring after a long day, however the flat is in a fantastic location.

reviews.name: Sally
reviews.comments: The location was perfect! So close to everything we wanted to do and see with beautiful views

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: The flat is modern, clean, spacious and very stylish.  It had everything we needed.

reviews.name: Rob
reviews.comments: Wonderful stay in a stylish and spacious flat with breathtaking views across the River Douro

reviews.name: Jason
reviews.comments: Very nice place well located  Hosts are vey welcoming and give good advice.Highly recommended!
